page.title: 10American Forces Families(2)
page.content:
When we asked what they found hard to get used to they mentioned driving on the left, the light mornings (due to British summer-time) and small fridges and freezers!
To live in the{R.A.F. Married Quarters they have to pay about{Â£300 a month. However, they are very pleased with the house and think it is worth it.
They will probably be in this country for 4 years before going back to America. This was one of the reasons why they believed more Americans did not send their children to British schools. That is because of the difference in spelling certain words, the use of different scales of measurement and so on would all have to be re-learned on returning to the U.S.A.
